movements.additional_info: Trio 1, Trio 2, Repeat of the Minuetto

sources.autograph_score: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.580, 'Quartettino II' (for title, see No. 207)
sources.autograph_parts: Paris, Bibl. de l'Opéra, Réserve 507 (2) (for title and comment, see No. 207)
sources.first_edition: 1958, Rome, del Turco, in vol. 1 in the series Classici Italiani della Musica published under the auspices of UNESCO (score; revised by Pina Carmirelli)
sources.later_editions: 1960, Hamburg/London, Simrock (separate parts; revised by W. Höckner and H. Młynarczyk)
